name: Stephanie Krol
what_you_do: S. K. is a Global Higher Education Strategist, Award-Winning Author, Real Estate Educator, and Health & Wellness Educator for people and pets, focusing on transforming institutions and elevating brands.
who_you_serve: S. K. serves a diverse audience including educational institutions, real estate professionals, and individuals seeking health and wellness guidance.
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, consulting, publishing services
bio: 34 years of experience, 10,358 followers on LinkedIn, member of IBPA, Alli, MIPA & Nonfiction Authors Association.
business_focus: S. K. is a Global Higher Education Strategist, Award-Winning Author, Real Estate Educator, and Health & Wellness Educator for people and pets, focusing on transforming institutions and elevating brands. (higher education, real estate, wellness)
